DOC.brief_summary: The aim proposal examine whether endogenous GIP exogenous GIP alone combination insulin affect gastric emptying ( GE ) , appetite , energy intake , energy expenditure ( EE ) plasma level triglyceride ( TAG ) , free fatty acid FFA ) glycerol man .
DOC.brief_title: Glucose-dependent Insulinotropic Polypeptide ( GIP ) Lipid Metabolism
DOC.criteria: Informed oral write consent Caucasians age 18 year Normal 75 g oral glucose tolerance test ( OGTT ) Normal blood haemoglobin concentration Normal plasma lipid profile Firstdegree relatives diabetes familial hypertriglyceridemia
